document.query: CREATE TABLE `admin_setting` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `value` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `type` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `reference` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `description` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `admin_id` bigint(20), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
